label: Behavior 62647002
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: following a curved maritime route (the combination of stable speed, small heading variations, and slowly changing COG indicates the vessel is navigating along a gently curving channel or coastal path; the trajectory approximates a circular arc with radius ~2.5 km, modeled by a parametric equation: lat(t) ≈ 57.4207 + 0.0085 × t, lon(t) ≈ 11.6252 - 0.0148 × t + 0.0003 × t², where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
